Comment: > The United States added 177,000 jobs in April, despite nearly 9,000 federal workers losing their positions, according to a new report from the Bureau of Labor Statistics.  ...  > U.S. workers have also continued to see their earnings improve relative to inflation. In April 2025, U.S. workers were making 3.8% more per hour compared to April 2024. Workers were also earning 4.1% more per week last month compared to a year prior.
Author: zroxx2
